name: Beef's Adventure
description:
this is a gift for my wife, ThePancakeWitch, for our 15th anniversary. happy anniversary, i love you!

i made this game mostly from scratch in about 2 weeks. i used HTML5 canvas, javascript, bitECS, and matter.js for collision detection.

source: https://github.com/mochancrimthann/beefs-adventure

asset credit

music: Komiku

dog: https://pillowbyte.itch.io/slimigrationanimals
